description.value:
A two-pronged metal rod, this wand has a handle coated in thick rubber. Each prong ends in a copper coil. When Activated, the wand produces a loud zapping sound.

Activate Cast a Spell

Frequency once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze], electrocuting the target into immobility. Each target takes @Damage[1d12[electricity]] damage at the start of its turns while it remains stunned or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] due to the spell.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze]of the appropriate level.
